name: Calciums
title: Calciums
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains Calciums medications.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who are on Calciums medications. Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element will map to the Medication category.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes RxNorm codes for any form of Calciums medications.),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
